title: [flang][OpenMP] Resolve names for declare simd uniform clause
body:
Add a visitor for OmpClause::Uniform to resolve its parameter names.
Fixes issue #140741.
commits:
[flang][OpenMP] Resolve names for declare simd uniform clause

Add a visitor for OmpClause::Uniform to resolve its parameter names.
Fixes issue #140741.

Signed-off-by: Kajetan Puchalski <kajetan.puchalski@arm.com>
Fix OmpUniform flag handling, add debug symbol dump test
Remove OmpUniform from data sharing attrs
